de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap

Class Bitmap32Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Bitmap32Manager

  • public class Bitmap32Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Bitmap32Manager controls reading and writing of Bitmap32Sequences.

      • deflateBitmap

        public void deflateBitmap(java.io.OutputStream os,
                          Bitmap32 bitmap)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Deflates a single bitmap to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        os - The OutputStream to write to.
        bitmap - A Bitmap32 object to deflate.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of IO problems while file writing.

      • applyDeflatedBitmap

        public void applyDeflatedBitmap(int nChunkCode,
                                byte[] abData)
                         throws java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Gets the still deflated bitmap data and passes it to inflate.
        Parameters:
        nChunkCode - Either IDAT or fdAT.
        abData - The bitmap bytes still deflated.
        Throws:
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException - In case of corrupted data.

      • getSequence

        public Bitmap32Sequence getSequence()
        Gets the Bitmap32Sequence actually in use.
        Returns:
        A Bitmap32Sequence object. Or null if there is actually none.
